member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.InternationalPhoneNumberAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a string data field value must represent a phone number in international format (as parsed by ).
member.remarks: This attribute is also capable of validating items in enumerables (whose items are strings) or in dictionaries (whose keys and values are strings). The number of items validated, in that case, are limited to .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.InternationalPhoneNumberAttribute.ReceiveSms
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the phone number should be able to receive SMS.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.InternationalPhoneNumberAttribute.MaxItemsValidated
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of items that will be validated when the field value is an enumerable or a dictionary. The default value is 50.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.InternationalPhoneNumberAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.InternationalPhoneNumberAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A value indicating whether the phone number should be able to receive SMS.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Describes a international phone number. It also provides static methods to parse, format, validate international phone numbers.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.RawNumber
member.summary: Gets the raw number, as used to initialize this instance.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.CountryCode
member.summary: Gets the country code.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.NationalNumber
member.summary: Gets the national number.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.Extension
member.summary: Gets the extension.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.NumberKind
member.summary: Gets the kind of the phone number.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.MayReceiveSms
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the phone is capable of receiving SMS.
member.remarks: Note that this may not be accurate because it is determined from the number kind. A given number kind may be indicative that the number is capable of receiving SMS and not the concrete number, for any specific reason (like contracts with the operator).

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a phone number, expected to be in international format.
member.param: The phone number that should be parsed.
member.returns: The parsed phone number.
member.exception: Raised when the provided string is not a phone number.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.Parse(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses a phone number, expected to be for the specified country/region.
member.param: The phone number that should be parsed.
The country/region (ISO-3166-alpha2) that the number is expected to be from. Used only if the number is not in international format.
member.returns: The parsed phone number.
member.exception: Raised when the provided string is not a phone number.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.TryParse(System.String,Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber@)
member.summary: Tries to parse a phone number, expected to be in international format.
member.param: The phone number that should be parsed.
The parsed phone number. Null if it could not be parsed.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the phone number could be parsed.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.TryParse(System.String,System.String,Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber@)
member.summary: Tries to parse a phone number, expected to be for the specified country/region.
member.param: The phone number that should be parsed.
The country/region (ISO-3166-alpha2) that the number is expected to be from. Used only if the number is not in international format.
The parsed phone number. Null if it could not be parsed.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the phone number could be parsed.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.Format(System.String)
member.summary: Formats a phone number, expected to be in international format, according to the E.164 format.
member.param: The phone number that should be formatted.
member.returns: The formatted phone number.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.Format(System.String,Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumberFormat)
member.summary: Formats a phone number, expected to be in international format, according to the specified format.
member.param: The phone number that should be formatted.
The format that should be used.
member.returns: The formatted phone number.

member.summary: Formats a phone number, expected to be for the specified country/region, according to the E.164 format.
member.param: The phone number that should be formatted.
The country/region (ISO-3166-alpha2) that the number is expected to be from. Used only if the number is not in international format.
member.returns: The formatted phone number.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.Format(System.String,System.String,Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumberFormat)
member.summary: Formats a phone number, expected to be for the specified country/region, according to the specified format.
member.param: The phone number that should be formatted.
The country/region (ISO-3166-alpha2) that the number is expected to be from. Used only if the number is not in international format.
The format that should be used.
member.returns: The formatted phone number.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.Validate(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether a phone number, expected to be in international format, is valid.
member.param: The phone number that should be validated.
member.returns: True if the specified phone number is valid; otherwise, false.
member.exception: Raised when the provided string is not a phone number.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.Validate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether a phone number, expected to be for the specified country/region, is valid.
member.param: The phone number that should be validated.
The country/region (ISO-3166-alpha2) that the number is expected to be from. Used only if the number is not in international format.
member.returns: True if the specified phone number is valid; otherwise, false.
member.exception: Raised when the provided string is not a phone number.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.TryValidate(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to determine whether a phone number, expected to be in international format, is valid. No exception is raised if the phone number can not be parsed.
member.param: The phone number that should be validated.
member.returns: True if the specified phone number is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.TryValidate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tries to determine whether a phone number, expected to be for the specified country/region, is valid. No exception is raised if the phone number can not be parsed.
member.param: The phone number that should be validated.
The country/region (ISO-3166-alpha2) that the number is expected to be from. Used only if the number is not in international format.
member.returns: True if the specified phone number is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Primitives.PhoneNumbers.PhoneNumber.IsValid
member.summary: Determines whether the phone number is valid in the respective region.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the phone number is valid in the respective region.
member.remarks: A value may be formally correct for a given region yet no be valid if, for example, the carrier indicator is invalid. This method verifies that (for regions supported).
